cases = int(input())
for _ in range(cases):
    num = int(input())
    a = '('
    b = ')'
    ab = '()'
    for i in range(num):
        ans = ab * i + a * (num - i) + b * (num - i)
        print(ans)

def solve(n):
    for i in range(n):
        j = i
        k = n - i
        ans = '()' * j
        temp = '(' * k
        temp += ')' * k
        ans += temp
        print(ans)
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    solve(n)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    answer = [() for j in range(n)]
    print(*answer, sep='')
    for j in range(2, n + 1):
        x = '()' * (n - j) + '(' * j + ')' * j
        print(x)
